item.title: New Cookie Quote # 9354
item.description: Conquer your fears or they will conquer you.

item.title: New Cookie Quote # 9251
item.description: You only need look to your own reflection for inspiration. Because you are Beautiful!

item.title: New Cookie Quote # 9226
item.description: Good news from afar may bring you a welcome visitor.

item.title: New Cookie Quote # 9225
item.description: When all else seems to fail, smile for today and just love someone.

item.title: New Cookie Quote # 9214
item.description: When you look down, all you see is dirt, so keep looking up.

item.title: New Cookie Quote # 9212
item.description: If you are afraid to shake the dice, you will never throw a six.

item.title: New Cookie Quote # 9207
item.description: A single conversation with a wise man is better than ten years of study.

item.title: New Cookie Quote # 9200
item.description: Happiness is often a rebound from hard work.

item.title: New Cookie Quote # 9196
item.description: The world may be your oyster, but that doesn't mean you'll get it's pearl.

item.title: New Cookie Quote # 9190
item.description: You're true love will show himself to you under the moonlight.

item.title: New Cookie Quote # 9174
item.description: Do not follow where the path may lead. Go where there is no path...and leave a trail

item.title: New Cookie Quote # 9169
item.description: Do not fear what you don't know

item.title: New Cookie Quote # 9167
item.description: The object of your desire comes closer.

item.title: New Cookie Quote # 9150
item.description: If you wish to know the mind of a man, listen to his words
